entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Saugeen Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:49 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 6:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: S 42 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow and local blowing snow. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local amount 5 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
